Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: So, there’s always the concern about being physically safe/stable, but on the emotional side, some less-traditional things that have helped me are art therapy and equine therapy (I did a type that did not involve actually riding). I‘m also trying more mindfulness practice because that really seems to help me divest myself from my brain’s incessant unhelpful commentary. Music therapy and neurofeedback also interest me, but I haven’t tried them.   I think sometimes rather than fighting the darkness directly, it’s better to work on bringing in more light. After all, it’s hard to keep trying when we struggle to imagine a future that we’d want to live. I hope you will find some things that help you conceive of a future you want to be part of. <3
